https://tmrev.io/movie/27425-Blind Beast 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8uhHS2yhCCMfa4p00VBrbT2GK05.jpg A blind sculptor kidnaps an artists’ model and imprisons her in his warehouse studio – a shadowland of perverse monuments to the female form. Here a deranged passion play of sensual and sexual obsession is acted out in world where sight is replaced by touch. Blind Beast
